name: Piggy's Great Adventure
description:
Piggy'sGreat Adventure is a simulation RPG.
Piggy, a little dragon, and Simon, a human boy, are adventuring in a fantasy world where dragons,
elves, orcs, and other various races live.
Simon and his friends have more than 40 unique characters to choose from.
Simon and his friends grow up with more than 40 unique units
and fight fierce battles against an army of demons led by green demons (orcs).

Nemesis Orcs



On the Mede continent, where Simon and his friends live, various demons lurk.
Orcs are particularly vicious, attacking humans and gathering in the darkness to plot against them.


Battle


The units that join you are gorgeously drawn and have their own unique fighting style.
They defeat their enemies in their own unique fighting style. As they gain experience and level up
As they gain experience and level up, their stats increase, and sometimes they learn skills or acquire special weapons.


Various species


There are many subhumans of various kinds living in this world.
They help us, but sometimes they may be hostile to us.
When they become allies, they become reassuring friends and play an active role.
More than 40 friends will join and help Simon and Piggy.


Conclusion


Weapons are expendable.
　Weapons such as swords and bows handled by many units are longer consumable.
　Subhumans who deal in physical arts have an advantage in this regard, as they can unleash their fists indefinitely.
Class Change
　Some characters can change classes by grabbing an adapted badge.
　Some characters can change classes to bring out their full potential.

Uploading of play videos and secondary works are allowed within the bounds of decency.
You are free to do so within the bounds of common sense.
